emotions.name: Ecstacy
emotions.description: Rapturous delight. A state of very great happiness, nearly overwhelming.

emotions.name: Wonder
emotions.description: An experience of something that is vey surprising, beautiful, amazing or hard to believe.

emotions.name: Vengefulness
emotions.description: Desire to retaliate after one is hurt.

emotions.name: Sorrow
emotions.description: A feeling of distress and sadness, often caused by a loss.

emotions.name: Horror
emotions.description: A mixture of fear, disgust, and shock.

emotions.name: Loathing
emotions.description: Intense disgust focused on a person. Intense disugust focused on oneself is called self-loathing.

emotions.name: Abhorrence
emotions.description: A mixture of intense disgust and hatred.

emotions.name: Revulsion
emotions.description: A mixture of disgust and loathing.
